data.comment: Today's referee, Dave Gantar, has blown to start the match.
Ball safe as Kansas City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Cincinnati.
Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dave Gantar signals a Kansas City throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
In the minute 5, Cincinnati are pushing forward but Jurgen Locadia's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Kansas City at Nippert Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
In the minute 6, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Cincinnati are coming forward and Siem de Jong gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cincinnati.
In the minute 9, Cincinnati to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
Throw-in Kansas City.
Cincinnati have a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Free kick Cincinnati.
Dave Gantar awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
In the minute 18, Throw-in high up the field for Kansas City in Cincinnati.
In Cincinnati Kansas City attack through Alan Pulido. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at Nippert Stadium.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
Free kick for Cincinnati in the half of Kansas City.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cincinnati.
In the minute 22, Dave Gantar signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
Tom Pettersson for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
Can Kansas City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cincinnati's half?
Dave Gantar awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 28, Kansas City to take a throw-in in Cincinnati territory.
In Cincinnati a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Felipe Hernandez for Kansas City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 29, Cincinnati have a goal kick.
Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Dave Gantar.
Siem de Jong of Cincinnati gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 32, Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in the half of Kansas City.
Throw-in for Cincinnati at Nippert Stadium.
In the minute 37, Throw-in Kansas City.
Can Cincinnati get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 38, Dave Gantar signals a free kick to Kansas City.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Dave Gantar.
Dave Gantar signals a throw-in for Kansas City, close to Cincinnati's area.
In the minute 40, Dave Gantar awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
Ball safe as Cincinnati is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kansas City have a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Free kick in a good position for Cincinnati!
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Cincinnati.
Dave Gantar has blown to start the second-half.
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
Roger Espinoza is replacing Felipe Hernandez for Kansas City at Nippert Stadium.
In the minute 46, Peter Vermes is making the team's second substitution at Nippert Stadium with Gerso Fernandes replacing Khiry Shelton.
In the minute 48, Cincinnati have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kansas City's Gerso Fernandes breaks free at Nippert Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 49, It's a goal kick for the home team in Cincinnati.
Dave Gantar awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Kansas City at Nippert Stadium.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Cincinnati at Nippert Stadium.
Cincinnati needs to be cautious. Kansas City have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
In the minute 52, Dave Gantar awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
Dave Gantar signals a Kansas City throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for Cincinnati at Nippert Stadium.
Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
In the minute 57, Kansas City take a 0-1 lead thanks to Roger Espinoza.
Alan Pulido with an assist there.
Throw-in Cincinnati.
In the minute 60, Kansas City's Roberto Puncec has been booked in Cincinnati.
Cincinnati have been awarded a penalty...
Cincinnati are awarded a penalty at Nippert Stadium. Siem de Jong takes the kick ... But misses!
In the minute 64, Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
Dave Gantar signals a free kick to Kansas City just outside Cincinnati's area.
In the minute 66, Kansas City's Johnny Russell gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
Dave Gantar signals a Kansas City throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
In the minute 67, Cincinnati needs to be cautious. Kansas City have an attacking throw-in.
Gadi Kinda (Kansas City) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Dave Gantar.
In the minute 68, In Cincinnati Kansas City drive forward through Roger Espinoza. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in high up the field for Kansas City in Cincinnati.
Dave Gantar signals a throw-in for Kansas City, close to Cincinnati's area.
In the minute 70, Goal kick for Kansas City at Nippert Stadium.
Dave Gantar signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
Can Kansas City capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 72, Gerso Fernandes for Kansas City drives towards goal at Nippert Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Dave Gantar.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 75, Cincinnati's Siem de Jong is on target but unsuccessful.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Cincinnati capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kansas City's half?
In the minute 76, Cincinnati's Tom Pettersson breaks free at Nippert Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
Kansas City have a goal kick.
In the minute 77, The home team replace Jurgen Locadia with Yuya Kubo.
Important block from the Kansas City defence as Haris Medunjanin fires in a strike for Cincinnati.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
Jaap Stam (Cincinnati) is making a second substitution, with Saad Abdul-Salaam replacing Zico Bailey.
In Cincinnati Cincinnati attack through Frankie Amaya. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Cincinnati.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
The home team have replaced Kamohelo Mokotjo with Brandon Vazquez. This is the third substitution made today by Jaap Stam.
Ball safe as Kansas City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, Peter Vermes is making the team's third substitution at Nippert Stadium with Cameron Duke replacing Gadi Kinda.
Dave Gantar awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 82, Dave Gantar awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dave Gantar signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 85, Dave Gantar awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
Johnny Russell gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kansas City.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Dave Gantar.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Cincinnati.
Cincinnati pushes forward through Brandon Vazquez, whose finish on goal is saved.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cincinnati.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
Throw-in Kansas City.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
In Cincinnati a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Kansas City at Nippert Stadium.
Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dave Gantar signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
Erik Hurtado (Kansas City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dave Gantar signals a Cincinnati throw-in in Kansas City's half.
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
Cincinnati make their fourth substitution with Jimmy McLaughlin replacing Tom Pettersson.
Peter Vermes (Kansas City) is making a fourth substitution, with Erik Hurtado replacing Alan Pulido.
